Pre-Game Insights: France flattering to deceive in their first few games at a major tournament but still getting the results they need to reach the next round
Belgium have work to do after unconvincing group stage
Others: France and Belgium will face off in the round of 16 of Euro 2024
The match will take place on Monday, 1 July 2024, at the Merkur Spiel-Arena in Dusseldorf, Germany
The match will be broadcast on FS1
